message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $15,000. Given its high value and unique features, this is an excellent opportunity for you to benefit from its exceptional quality. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're placing on the product, $15,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it, which is my maximum budget. Please let me know if you're open to discussing this further.
